attributes.action: Hold a referendum on support to Ukraine
attributes.additional_details:
We give aid to Ukraine and have been since the start of war but right now the money we’ve been giving is an absurd amount. 

We’ve always aided other countries too, hundreds of millions of pounds even up to a billion yes but the currently the billions going into Ukraine needs to be decided by the people
attributes.background: We have sent a total of 2.2 billion pounds in only 2022 to Ukraine. We are in an economic crisis, families are struggling, inflation has been on the rise yet we sent billions to Ukraine. The people should decide wether to send our billions there or not.
